entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:48 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beauceville 3:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -29.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -35.6°C
Wind: WNW 19 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
